name: Tab-Options
description: Detect & merge duplicate tabs, group by domain, save sessions, export/import tabs. Lightweight & open source.

scripts.dev:chrome: pnpm copy-manifest:chrome && rimraf dev-build && parcel watch src/manifest.json --host localhost --config @parcel/config-webextension --dist-dir dev-build/chrome --no-cache
scripts.dev:firefox: pnpm copy-manifest:firefox && rimraf dev-build && parcel watch src/manifest.json --host localhost --config @parcel/config-webextension --dist-dir dev-build/firefox --no-cache
scripts.build:chrome: pnpm copy-manifest:chrome && rimraf dist && parcel build src/manifest.json --config @parcel/config-webextension --dist-dir dist/chrome --no-cache --no-source-maps
scripts.build:firefox: pnpm copy-manifest:firefox && rimraf dist && parcel build src/manifest.json --config @parcel/config-webextension --dist-dir dist/firefox --no-cache --no-source-maps
scripts.package: rimraf release && pnpm package:chrome && pnpm package:firefox
